alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 8:53PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .Recent rainfall in the Big Muddy basin has caused rises in the river. At Murphysboro, the river is forecast to rise above flood stage midweek and crest in minor flooding late this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some minor flooding in S 3rd & Division / Plum Street area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 24.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
